### Business Consultants, Levels II and III
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Category:** SRV

**Tender Details:**
- **Solicitation Number:** 20220537
- **Reference Number:** PW-22-01003758
- **Publication Date:** August 9, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date and Time:** September 14, 2022, 2:00 PM

**Contract Details:**
- **Contracting Entity:** Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions
- **Address:** 255 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1A0H2
- **Contract Description:** Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) - Stream 4: Business Services

**Security Requirements:**

- **Minimum Corporate Security:** Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
- **Minimum Resource Security:** Reliability Status

**Description of Work:**
The IM/IT Division of the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions is seeking the provision of IM/IT strategic business consulting services, on an “as and when requested” basis, in the National Capital Region (NCR) and Greater Toronto Area (GTA), over the next two to five years.

**Invitation to Bid:**
The following firms have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Accenture Inc.
* Acumen Solutions Consulting Canada Inc.
* Adecco Employment Services Limited / Services de placement Adecco Limited
* BDO Canada LLP
* CSI Consulting Inc.
* Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting, in Joint Venture
* Ernst & Young LLP
* IBM Canada Limited / IBM Canada Limitée
* KPMG LLP
* Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
* Protak Consulting Group Inc.
* Randstad Interim Inc.
* S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
* Strategic Relationships Solutions Inc.
* Taligent Consulting Inc.

**Contact Information:**
- **Name:** Jade Bedard
- **Email:** [contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca](mailto:contracting@osfi-bsif.gc.ca)

Note that the contract period will be from the date of contract to March 31, 2023, with an irrevocable option to extend it for up to three (3) additional one (1)-year periods.
